html:
3.13.24  12:32 pm   why did composers such as charlie parker and john coltrane have such an obsessive, sexual fascination with the II-7 V7 I^?

      it was all over popular music, during their lifetime and just before

3.13.24  12:05 pm   Why do you never use capital letters?

      the reason i suppose it could appear that way is if you were paying little to no attention whatsoever, especially to any of the blaringly emphatic texts that come across the screen in any of my videos, many of which are in fact in all capitals, or various other patterns of capitalization. that's also not even to mention all the capitals i use just here on the questions page, for chord symbols or a milieu of other reasons

3.13.24  11:37 am   if i write a play, should the villain be the main character? should the villain be a cat named carl? 

      it doesn't have to be, but it may

3.13.24  11:15 am   Things are happening. How to prevent this

      you can't, the only thing you can do is choose some of your own things to make happen

3.13.24  10:23 am   How are you my friend ? Hello from France :)

      jourbon

3.13.24  10:10 am   are you going to make a new video soon

      i almost didn't think of that

3.13.24  9:31 am   Did we actually kill God?

      no, put it this way, whatever you may be referring to is far far far too evasive to even so much as be referred to

3.13.24  9:31 am   what question did I ask again?

      this one

3.13.24  8:51 am   do you agree with 'people shouldnt watch other creators' stuff because it might damage their self identify or who they are as a person' ok i said that, but honestly the moment i watch something i think my mind may reprogram its self to this guys' style and i dont like that each human as their own unique style that one human might enjoy to listen to or to connect to

      there are reasons for both: reasons for paying attention to other people's creations, and reasons for not. eventually you can hopefully try both

3.13.24  8:15 am   In here comes the sun, why do you say and write in the video "then sadness comes to sing a song for you.", when in the lyrics page you wrote "and sadness comes to sing a song for you."?

      because, in this case, the difference between "and" and "then" is so miniscule that i neither notice nor care

3.13.24  7:42 am   Do you sometimes listen back to recordings of yourself spelling out a song idea in order to "get back in the mood" where it felt great at that moment? (And not only to remember the idea.) Does that work for you? I'm asking because I have a problem where I feel unable to get back in those moods because when I'm in "producer mode" they seem futile.

      it can be wise to check the original version, in case it may have unwittingly morphed over time

3.13.24  7:40 am   What is my favorite letter of the alphabet?

      i have it written down somewhere

3.13.24  6:38 am   Would you say you have neat handwriting?

      i can

3.13.24  6:16 am   there's so many many people in the world, and they're all doing their own thing - how the heck does that work?

      we'll see

3.13.24  5:37 am   what times do the corner store close

      midnight i assume

3.13.24  5:34 am   will i ever feel truly honest when i write music?

      i don't know. this may be a long shot, but try speaking your own language, if you haven't done that already

3.13.24  5:33 am   what is opinion on egg

      it's ok

3.13.24  5:10 am   How to type?

      press each key to see what it does, then your brain will do the rest, eventually accruing an immediate instinct for what key will produce which letter at any given time, on an increasingly instantaneous timescale, without having to think about it at all

3.13.24  5:09 am   I really bloody love music but I'm unsure about doing it as a career. I had tried for a little bit but now (heartbrokenly) I'm thinking of doing computer science. I'm sad bc it feels like I'm betraying music by not trying to do it as hard as possible... do you have any insight or hope about this?

      the amount that you do music will probably end up aligning with the amount that you love it. so, however much that is. what you do for a living is a different story, that just comes down to how clever you can be, with music or otherwise

3.13.24  3:26 am   do you ever apple? then before your eyes realize it banana.

      no. apples and bananas are too different. i would never make that mistake

3.13.24  3:21 am   Ever been to the moon?

      no but i can see it from my house

3.13.24  2:20 am   what's your favorite somg

      are there any that save the universe

3.13.24  1:34 am   did 7 eat 9

      no

3.12.24  10:59 pm   Do you consider yourself a genius. Or just maybe whimsical 

      there's got to be some middle ground

3.12.24  10:06 pm   Every time I collaborate with other musicians, they let me down, or I let them down. I think it might be time for a solo venture...

      that makes sense

3.12.24  9:49 pm   how do you feel about algebra

      pretty good

3.12.24  8:44 pm   how to stop being careless and making silly mistakes

      go ahead and make all the mistakes. get it over with

3.12.24  7:53 pm   does the song "meet me in September" confirm you are confined to the plane of all we can perceive

      i don't think so

3.12.24  7:24 pm   How many songs have you made?

      a hand ful

3.12.24  6:49 pm   why is music so mathematically perfect? seems like mathemagic to me

      it's actually quite mathematically not-perfect. that's the whole thing that makes it any good

3.12.24  4:40 pm   will you tacitly admit to something without saying it outright

      i'll try, but i'm also not responsible for you thinking i meant something i didn't mean

3.12.24  4:35 pm   any advice for getting past musical writer's block?

      sure. now is your chance to do a suck contest. you may be in just the right mood to see if you can set a record for how bad you can make a song. i promise this is fun

3.12.24  4:20 pm   is st patricks day actually real or a fabrication of the masses to lead us all into a foolish society where people where green?

      it's both of course

3.12.24  2:58 pm   In your opinion, is thinking about dopamine/serotonin/etc. to "get things done" as superficial as thinking about scales to play melodies?

      no, i actually don't particularly see a relationship between those 2 things

3.12.24  1:25 pm   I made a little origami bird, do you want it?

      no, i already have too many of those

3.12.24  11:58 am   What is the least prime number? I don't mean what is the smallest prime number,  but rather what number (besides infinity) is divisible by the most other numbers (I suppose a way to ask this is what is the most un-prime number)? 

      you can always have a bigger number with more factors. but here are some numbers that have a particularly high number of factors compared to other similer-sized numbers: 360, 420, 5040, 420420

3.12.24  11:41 am   What's a good way to get inspiration?

      you can take a look at a toaster, in action

3.12.24  11:35 am   do you write songs about stories you come up with beforehand? or do you let the words show you their own way line by line?

      line by line. music is so powerful, it can throw you in a totally different direction from whatever else you may have had planned. However, sometimes it's nice to start as if you're gonna write a story, then throw the music into it and then watch it escape to a somewhere totally different

3.12.24  11:13 am   Whatifiweretonotaddasinglespaceinthisquestuon?

      it would make it harder to read, and, maybe even harder to write. possible misspellings

3.12.24  11:10 am   How do I even decide what to learn first? I wanna dive into everything out there. But then, there's this fear that I might suck at the stuff I'm super into. Like, I'm crazy about movies and science, but making a movie or doing actual new research? That's like :'( . What if I just don't have what it takes? Maybe I should focus on stuff I'm actually good at and enjoy. But dang, it's like I don't even know where my skills really are. How do I cram in all the things I wanna do before I kick the bucket? And what if I'm just not cut out for anything? Am I doomed to be a forever consumer?

      it's extremely unlikely that you are only a consumer. all the necessary ambition is there, in addition to a bit of anxiety also

3.12.24  11:05 am   what was the bad thing you did?

      produced a song too quickly and too slowly at the same time, thereby accidentally working on it for the exact right amount of time

3.12.24  10:59 am   do you make up your keyboard solos on the spot when you record your songs, or do you write em first

      i've done it both ways

3.12.24  9:37 am   if you replace the foam in a plushie is it a different plushie

      no

3.12.24  9:14 am   Do i have to do compression? I kinda only want it on the bass, and bass drumms. I only put eq on the vocals. I am i going to mixer hell? Idk sounds fine to me. I know I might change my mind after i do sounds tests on different speakers

      if you're doing what you think sounds good, then you've already won

3.12.24  7:48 am   Why is the sky ?

      i think that was your idea

3.12.24  7:47 am   is it worth doing something you enjoy if no one else will watch what you make

      sometimes

3.12.24  7:23 am   why don't most rooms have rooms embedded within the rooms for maximum rooming potential 

      that's hard to achieve

3.12.24  6:05 am   do you reference your other songs in some of your songs?

     very rarely

      like in mt saint helens is bout to blow up, do you reference slow down with the line "we'll never slow down" with the tone changing on slow down and the blimp turning into a clock?

     that seems impossible, because mt saint helens was written and produced before slow down was written and produced

      Or in i'm a princess where theres the lines "dreamed that it's okay" and the stars are similar to colours used in more than a dream, is that a reference to more than a dream? (sorry for the long question)

     again, impossible, because "i'm a princess" was written and produced long before "more than a dream"

3.12.24  3:54 am   if i dont finish something quickly i think it might never get done

      i understand

3.12.24  3:30 am   How does it make you feel knowing that total strangers have dreamed about you in their sleep?

      fine
